item.title: SCOTUS’s Refusal To End Leftists’ Judicial Coup Is Damaging Its Credibility More Than The Media Ever Could
item.description: By refusing to rein in the lower courts' lawlessness, SCOTUS has greenlit a judicial coup that is stymying the will of 77 million Americans.

item.title: NYT Wants You To Feel Very Sorry For This Drug-Dealing Kidnapper Trump Deported
item.description: He made bad choices and is owed no sympathy. He owes the U.S. thanks for the opportunities he was given even after conviction.

item.title: Gun Control Doesn’t Stop Shootings Outside The United States, So It Won’t Here Either
item.description: Targeted attacks on schools are not uniquely American. They are global phenomena driven by evil, not geography or firearms laws.
